title: amendments to consider adding/researching for matbench v1 [living document]

labels.name: v2.0
labels.description: Issues and enhancements for upcoming major release v2.0

body:
### Additions

- Composition/UV-Vis measurements from 179072 metal oxides from [here](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-019-0019-4#Sec9)

- 165 Thermoelectric zT measurements at 300K [Id 150888](https://citrination.com/datasets/150888/) mentioned [here](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs40192-017-0098-z)  seemingly gathered from [here](https://doi.org/10.1021/cm400893e)

- ~~160 thermoelectric pF measurements compared with experimental [ID: 152463](https://citrination.com/datasets/152463) from [here](https://pubs.rsc.org/en/content/articlelanding/2016/TC/C5TC04339E#!divAbstract)~~

- 585 superconductor temperatures [ID: 2210](https://citrination.com/datasets/2210) mentioned [here](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs40192-017-0098-z)

- 786 materials, 26 with curie point beyond 400k for 2D ferromagnets from [here](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41524-020-0300-2)

- expt_formation_enthalpy from matminer.datasets

### Amendments

- dielectric must remove n=1 entries which have since been deprecated/removed by MP
- expt_gap and expt_is_metal Cd2Te should be examined
- matbench_mp_* datasets should be remade to reflect SCAN functional and new energies


### Structural changes
- create tests that reflect use case: e.g., jdft2d should be evaluated on ability to identify mats with low exfoliation energy, glass should be organized according to chemical space, etc.
